title: Data Literate with R
text:
You can download the ZIP-archive with all material here. This archive includes:



Folder
Content




book
The compiled book in PDF format


data
All data from the chapters


docs
All chapters as single PDF files


exercises
All exercises as PDF files (sometimes with solutions)


scripts
All code from the chapters as plain R-Scripts (.R)


slides
A collection of slide decks in PDF format
